mapper.insert: insert into ecs_group_goods (parent_id, goods_id, admin_id, goods_price) values (#{parent_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goods_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{admin_id,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{goods_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.select: select parent_id, goods_id, admin_id, goods_price from ecs_group_goods
